mapper.sql: id, shopName, companyId, companyName, companyAccount, bannerUrl, updateTime, opreatorId, status, reason
mapper.select:
select
from t_m_shop_check where 1=1
and companyAccount like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
and companyName like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
and shopName like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_m_shop_check (id, shopName, companyId, companyName, companyAccount, bannerUrl, updateTime, opreatorId, status, reason) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opreatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
